body_html: @alextp I'm not sure which API you are referring to, but I think it will be better if tensorflow support sparse variables. Although I can accumulate IndexedSlices out side of the graph, this workaround is still not very elegant. And sparse variable seems like a more natural way to solve @MohammadSamragh's problem, which is more efficient than using mask.
